titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Gladys Davis Turner Collection, 1889-1986
titlestmt.subtitle: Turner, Gladys Davis Collection Coll. 8

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using a form and manually entry 2021-10-25

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
The Edgar Cayce Foundation Coll. 8

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: The Edgar Cayce Foundation, Virginia Beach, Virginia
did.langmaterial: Materials in this collection are in English.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in 6 series: 1. Binders, 1889-1986. 2. Date books, 1900-1986. 3. Observation notebooks, 1932-1935. 4. Artifacts, 1948-1975. 5. Files, 1929-1986. 6. Books and oversize, 1909-1983.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item,] [date (if known)], Gladys Davis Turner Collection, Coll. 8, box_, folder_, The Edgar Cayce Foundation, Virginia Beach, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes both professional and personal papers of Gladys Davis Turner, Edgar Cayce's long-time stenographer and secretary and co-founder of the Edgar Cayce Foundation in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research use.
Unpublished manuscripts are protected by copyright. Permission to publish, quote, or reproduce must be secured from the repository and the copyright holder.
